TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ExtendedProtectionPolicy extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 類別，代表伺服器用來驗證連入用戶端連線的延伸保護原則。

span.span: The class represents the extended protection policy used by the server to validate incoming client connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公開 （expose） 任何類別類別應該不允許 null 的原則設定，應該提供預設原則，或應該需要建立及設定應用程式開發人員或系統管理員的明確原則。Any classes that expose the class should not allow the setting of null policies, should supply a default policy, or should require an explicit policy to be created and set by the application developer or administrator.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: A value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement policyEnforcement, valuetype System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario protectionScenario, class System.Collections.ICollection customServiceNames) cil managed

param.name: policyEnforcement
param.span: 值，指出應該在何時強制執行延伸的保護原則。

span.span: A value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.

param.name: protectionScenario
param.span: 值，指出原則強制執行的保護類型。

span.span: A value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.

param.span: ，其中包含用來比對用戶端 SPN 的自訂 SPN 清單。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced, the kind of protection enforced by the policy, and a custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list that is used to match against a client's SPN.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個建構函式用來初始化的新執行個體類別，屬性設定為`policyEnforcement`參數，屬性設定為`protectionScenario`參數，而屬性是設定為`customServiceNames`參數。When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the class, the property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter, the property is set to the `protectionScenario` parameter, and the property is set to the `customServiceNames` parameter.

is or an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomChannelBinding As ChannelBinding

summary.span: 取得驗證用的自訂通道繫結語彙基元 (CBT)。

span.span: Gets a custom channel binding token (CBT) to use for validation.

value.span: 一個 ，包含驗證用的自訂通道繫結。

span.span: A that contains a custom channel binding to use for validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個唯讀屬性表示用來驗證自訂通道繫結 token。This read-only property represents a custom channel binding token to use for validation. CBT 提供自訂的外部通道時，這用於進階案例。This is used in advanced scenarios when the CBT is provided by a custom outer channel. 範例案例可能會使用這個屬性搭配和。An example scenario might use this property in combination with and .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomServiceNames As ServiceNameCollection

summary.span: 取得用來比對用戶端服務主體名稱的自訂服務提供者名稱 (SPN) 清單。

span.span: Gets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN.

value.span: ，其中包含用來比對用戶端 SPN 的自訂 SPN 清單。

span.span: A that contains the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個唯讀屬性會指出自訂的 SPN 清單是用來比對用戶端的 SPN。This read-only property indicates the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN. 根據預設，伺服器將會決定預設的 SPN 清單根據其已註冊的端點。By default, the server will determine a default SPN list according to its registered endpoints. 需要檢查 SPN 的情況下，指定此屬性可以使用 使用建構函式來覆寫預設值清單，用來比對用戶端的 SPN。For scenarios which require SPN checking, this property can be specified using a using a constructor to override the default list used to match against the client’s SPN.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property OSSupportsExtendedProtection As Boolean
public: static property bool OSSupportsExtendedProtection { bool get(); };

summary.span: 表示作業系統是否支援包含延伸保護的整合式 Windows 驗證。

span.span: Indicates whether the operating system supports integrated windows authentication with extended protection.

value.span: 如果作業系統支援包含延伸保護的整合式 Windows 驗證則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the operating system supports integrated windows authentication with extended protection, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前使用 Windows 7 和 Windows Server 2008 R2 上的應用程式的變更，才能支援擴充的保護。The changes to support extended protection are currently available for applications on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2. 擴充的保護功能都會更新中提供 Windows Vista 和 Windows Server 2008。The extended protection features will be made available as updates for Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008. 舊版 Windows 無法使用擴充保護的功能。The extended protection features are not available on earlier versions of Windows.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PolicyEnforcement As PolicyEnforcement

summary.span: 取得應該強制執行延伸保護原則的時間。

span.span: Gets when the extended protection policy should be enforced.

value.span: 值，指出應該在何時強制執行延伸的保護原則。

span.span: A value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個唯讀屬性會指出當延伸的保護原則應該強制執行 （一律，當用戶端，或永遠不會支援）。This read-only property indicates when extended protection policy should be enforced (always, when supported by clients, or never).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProtectionScenario As ProtectionScenario

summary.span: 取得延伸保護原則強制執行的保護類型。

span.span: Gets the kind of protection enforced by the extended protection policy.

value.span: 值，指出原則強制執行的保護類型。

span.span: A value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個唯讀屬性表示原則強制執行的保護的類型。This read-only property indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
